column1: an example approach is provided for presenting content in a user interface associated with social networking messages based on gaze tracking information. a content presentation platform determines a rendering of a user interface presenting one or more social networking messages. the content presentation platform further determines a selection of at least one of the one or more social networking messages based, at least in part, on gaze tracking information. the content presentation platform also causes, at least in part, a presentation of content at the user interface based, at least in part, on the selection.
